languages.text: "Тогда это — самый толковый идиот, которого я встречала. Он успешно исполнил покушение, но не способен даже сойти за настоящего преступника".
"Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully carried out the crime, yet there is nothing remotely nefarious in his behaviour."
languages.original_text: "Тогда это — самый толковый идиот, которого я встречала. Он успешно исполнил покушение, но не способен даже сойти за настоящего преступника".

traits.locale_text: "Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully executed the crime, yet there is nothing remotely criminal in his behaviour."
"Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully executed the crime, yet there is nothing remotely criminal in his behaviour."
"Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully carried out the crime, yet there is nothing remotely nefarious in his behaviour."
"Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully carried out the crime, yet there is nothing remotely nefarious in his behaviour."
"Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully carried out the crime, yet there is nothing remotely nefarious in his behaviour."
"Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully carried out the crime, yet there is nothing remotely nefarious in his behaviour."

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, c'est le simple d'esprit le plus brillant que j'ai jamais rencontré. Le moins qu'on puisse dire, c'est qu'il cache admirablement bien son jeu, pour quelqu'un qui a commis un crime aussi odieux. »
languages.original_text: "Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully carried out the crime, yet there is nothing remotely nefarious in his behaviour."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, c'est le simple d'esprit le plus brillant que j'ai jamais rencontré. Le moins qu'on puisse dire, c'est qu'il cache admirablement bien son jeu, pour quelqu'un qui a commis un crime aussi odieux. »

languages.text: «Pues estamos ante el imbécil más listo que he visto. No solo cometió el crimen, sino que no hay nada notable en su forma de comportarse».
languages.original_text: "Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully carried out the crime, yet there is nothing remotely nefarious in his behaviour."

traits.locale_text: «Pues estamos ante el imbécil más listo que he visto. No solo cometió el crimen, sino que no hay nada notable en su forma de comportarse».

languages.text: “那他就是我见过最聪明的白痴了。他成功实施了犯罪，可他现在的行为和‘邪恶’这个词几乎一点都沾不上边。”
languages.original_text: "Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully carried out the crime, yet there is nothing remotely nefarious in his behaviour."

traits.locale_text: “那他就是我见过最聪明的白痴了。他成功实施了犯罪，可他现在的行为和‘邪恶’这个词几乎一点都沾不上边。”

languages.text: 「それなら、彼は今まで見た中で最も賢いバカだ。彼は犯罪を成功させたが、彼の行動には少しも悪意がない」
languages.original_text: "Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully carried out the crime, yet there is nothing remotely nefarious in his behaviour."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、彼は今まで見た中で最も賢いバカだ。彼は犯罪を成功させたが、彼の行動には少しも悪意がない」

languages.text: "Dann ist er der klügste Idiot, den ich je gesehen habe. Er hat das Verbrechen erfolgreich ausgeführt, doch in seinem Verhalten liegt keine Spur von Ruchlosigkeit."
languages.original_text: "Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully carried out the crime, yet there is nothing remotely nefarious in his behaviour."

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist er der klügste Idiot, den ich je gesehen habe. Er hat das Verbrechen erfolgreich ausgeführt, doch in seinem Verhalten liegt keine Spur von Ruchlosigkeit."

languages.text: "O hâlde bugüne kadar gördüğüm en zeki ahmakmış. Suçu başarıyla işliyor ama habislikle uzaktan yakından alakalı en ufak bir davranış bile sergilemiyor."
languages.original_text: "Then he is the smartest idiot I've ever seen. He successfully carried out the crime, yet there is nothing remotely nefarious in his behaviour."
